description: This boy was full of contradictions. He claimed to be straight but enjoyed our meeting a lot. He also warned me about being really clumsy, it was the reason why he refused to take any technically oriented jobs. And yet he handled my cock with extraordinary skill. He claimed to be very shy and still he agreed to whore himself out for a good job and little extra cash. His body was just incredible and his cock so sweet. I gave him a pretty rough ride and tore his ass wide open. We went on for good 20 minutes before I unloaded on his cute face. And then he told me that he expected me to last longer. What a cheeky bastard! He was worth every single Crown I gave him. I hope he gets fired soon, I´ll be waiting for him. Next time, he´ll be barely able to sit or walk.
title: Dirty Scout 97
